metadata.name: WHAT IS IT FOR ?
metadata.description:
WHAT IS IT FOR? 

The NFT Culture Is facing gatekeepers, and digital art is not recognized as art all over the world.. often we hear, it is not real art, and has no value, what is it for? what do you do with it, if it is "only" digital? History repeats itself, we are often excluded from the world of art just like the American Figurative Expressionist Michael Hafftka was excluded back in the 80s : 

The artist struggled with having his artworks featured in galleries all around NYC even though they were over 80 at that time in the city... non accepted his artworks and they didn't accept to consider them. He was paying the price for being avant-garde and unconventional. He didn't follow the rules that were dictated by the art patrons and the art â€œintellectualsâ€ and was criticized by the public and artists.

The artist made a protest on 57th Street in NYC, a silent protest where he exhibited his artwork on the streets after being refused by the galleries who were gatekeeping his ART.

Criticized for being unconventional and misunderstood

WHAT IS IT FOR ? 

This is our manifesto about this rejection that the world shows towards the evolution of art from Digital Poems to AI, Photography and The Music on the blockchain.

This is happening with our culture today.  

FOR THE CULTURE
